mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, password, email, nickname, role, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{role}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname}, role = #{role}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE user SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
